# authentik_scope_mapping (Resource)




## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a scope mapping

resource "authentik_scope_mapping" "name" {
  name       = "minio"
  scope_name = "minio"
  expression = <<EOF
return {
  "policy": "readwrite",
}
EOF
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `expression` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `scope_name` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
